message.body: ï¿¼They got these 4pks of bessey clamps at the HD on Baltimore pike for $15 in case you need any.
Are we starting tomorrow? What time and what should I bring?
9 am. Bring yr grinder and hand tools. We'll be building a buttress in the basement.
Let me know when you want to take lunch. You guys can take the van to get the other 16 bags of concrete from woodland and I'll go to diamond and rent the vibrator.
